entry.title: Soft Baby Turkish Cotton Bath Towel
entry.summary:
Vendor: Classic Turkish Towels
Type: Bath Towels
Price: 23.99

Wrap your baby with these soft, absorbent, fluffy, warm towel; provides super absorbency, fast drying and comfort. Beautiful and vibrant soft colors to match any bathroom décor; excellent gift for new parents, birthdays, baby showers, and baby hampers. Made from natural materials and free from harmful chemicals, these baby towels make a safe, natural and healthy choice for your baby and kids. Hem stitch reinforced edges prevent unraveling; made with 100% ring-spun cotton makes the set lightweight and super-absorbent.
